meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Treisbach Frank Amanat Christopher Eaton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4406.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Mary Treisbach, a marketing consultant from Norristown, Pennsylvania
Frank Amanat, an attorney from South Orange, New Jersey
Christopher Eaton, a freelance writer from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,200)

tr.td: THE NATIONAL MUSEUM OF HEALTH & MEDICINE
2004 CALENDARS
PEACE CORPS
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
"C"LOTHES
3-LETTER ANAGRAMS
